评论详情: Bought 2 for son and DIL for Christmas. Both loved the fit and softness—not to thick and binding—not too thin. Luxurious.

Have now worn this now for a couple of months.  Although I like the Robe, I am a bit disappointed that the outer material is show signs of pilling.  Still a nice Robe and materials, but I might have expected better.

I own a Loews Hotel robe that looks identical to this one in color and shape, so I figured I'd order this one. $120 is steep for the quality of this thing- it is not soft. It's scratchy on the inside and does not feel luxurious for what's being advertised and for that price point. You are better off buying a luxury spa robe from a hotel like Marriott or Hilton, and I know Marriott offers them at different levels - like super luxury Ritz Carlton ones for $300 and Westin or Marriott ones for same price as this. Overall not impressed.
This robe fits so nicely and is true to size. The terry cloth interior is so soft and the robe it gorgeous. It's a keeper!

This robe is heavy, but manageable. It has the nice terry cloth inside to absorb when you get out of the shower. Outer layer is soft.  I am 5'4 and it was long on my, hits the top of my feet.  I love it.
Love the weight and warmth of this robe. Ankle length is perfect!
Perfect size and she loved the pink color. She fell in love the first time she used this robe.
This is the second one that I have ordered. I was so pleased with the first one and how it wore that the choice was easy.

My husband gifted this to me and it’s a little large, but he purchased a size L instead of M, so. . . . Didn’t seem worthwhile returning it. But the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that it was not made with an internal tie, as most high-quality robes are. You know, the two little ties that keep the robe together internally, keep it from gaping open as you move around. The external belt can’t do this by itself. I will have to get a white shoelace or something, cut it in half, and sew it in by hand. So that is annoying. I have never had a terry cloth robe without this feature. Design flaw.

I am thrilled! The color is described as aqua, oh no it is a beautiful light teal! The inside pocket is ribbed with the teal. It has two loops on the waist and one in the back! The length is perfect, 5’2 1/5 -120-40 depending on the day….. I chose small…it is perfect, with room to move. My last robe this wonderful came from a spa I love.
Warm, cuddly, not heavy weight be substantial. Not fleece which makes me sweat. I'm really short (4'11") and the length is good.  Above my ankles.
Wears well. Fits and feels great!
This robe is beautiful. It’s flattering in a way that attempts to dispel the frumpy Haus-Frau trope.

I bought as gift for my wife.  She loves pink.  I bought the smaller size when I was in question and it worked out well.  I bought a medium instead of large.  She's 5'8"  135 lbs.  I would buy again.

I like this robe. but not at the price.  the shell fabric is soft.  The 'terrycloth' is raspy.  It stains and does not clean well.  I had an incident with this robe, cooking bacon for breakfast.  The bacon grease spattered on the sleeve and being near the burner it caught fire.  The shell is plastic thread and it burned and stuck to whatever it was placed on.  Until I got the fire out.  Very Dangerous.!  All of this and the price earns this robe at best a 3 star rating.

I never write reviews but this robe is seriously fantastic. Perfect white and excellent quality.
Soft

Exactly what I was hoping for.  Fit is perfect, absorbent lining, soft luxury feel/look on the outside!

The color is ugly hardly aqua more like a dirty grey. This is typical of standard Chinese fabrics made for their own market. The fabric is gabardine it looks like a uniform fabric except the fiber is polyester. It looks very institutional.  It is extremely heavy. It would not be good in warm climates. It looks like it will last. It seems to be well constructed. It has an inside pocket as well.  I washed it before wearing it and it did not shrink. It was expensive but seems like it will be useful to wear to the pool and back to my apartment. It truly is a spa robe. Not very feminine more for both sexes.
Love this robe. Very well made. Pretty color and inside is so soft. Very tailored look. Money well spent.

评论概述: After 9 years, time to buy another one! Held up so well!
评论详情: I bought this robe in 2012, wore it every single morning and night, every single day! Wash it about once a month, still so soft and completely usable, the lining just now started to rip a little bit and I've stained the front with some whitening toothpaste that actually whitened it! So time for an new one! Ordered this morning, the old one is good enough still that I'll put it in our RV! Thank you! I got my new one today and it is identical just like I was hoping! <3

评论概述: stylish comfortable light wieght Spa robe
评论详情: I was replacing an old robe that I had and loved. It was difficult to find one that compared. This luxury spa  robe did! PerfectAlso, Heather, from company, communicated with me when package was  missing. SHe placed a claim with UPS. THE package was delivered today. Great customer service.

评论概述: Really Nice, But Has Some Design Flaws
评论详情: This robe feels very nice and it's relatively good quality.  As others have noted, though, it has a ridiculous inside pocket that gets all bunched up and creates bulk around the midriff, so I'll have to take it to the tailor to have it removed.  The shawl collar doesn't fold over and lie down properly. One side seam is slightly longer than the other.  The Aqua color is actually a Baby Blue.  Despite the design flaws, I've decided to keep it since it's the only spa-like robe I can find that comes in an XS to fit my petite frame.
This is an amazing quality robe. I rated 3 stars on "lightweight" because it is heavier, but that is exactly what I was looking for. Again, high quality, not cheaply made. I do wish it had a hood.

This is a fantastic robe! Soft, warm and full length. Reallly full length for me at 5’2”. Wish it was a little shorter, but it is great for a winter robe as it goes all the way to the bottom of my feet. I adore it-it feels like a luxurious spa robe.
Seriously, I am going to live in this robe!! Lol it's spa-perfect and I love it.
Just like the hotel robe I was hoping it would be.  For home, I think I should've chosen a color other than white.
Got this for my Grandson for Christmas and he loves it.

I wanted a spa-like robe and this just isn't it.  I guess if you are looking for super heavy duty, this would work, but its just too bulky and I look huge in it.  Not the way I like to see myself when I'm trying to pamper myself in luxury.  Sending it back.  Quality seems good, just way too heavy duty and masculine.

Perfect, just like the robes offered and available to purchase  at the spas in the 5 star hotels but without the hotel nane!  I had contemplated buying this robe at the Ritz but was concerned it would appear as if I stole it from the hotel room because the Ritz monogram was visibly seen and besides I try to avoid wearing garments that advertise.  Highly recommend this robe if you want a warm and lightweight robe.
Just to big
Definitely not light-weight. First thing she said after putting it on was, "Wow! This thing is heavy!"

评论详情: I’m 5’1” 170lbs with 36 DDD’s. Ordered a Large in Pink. Hits my ankles, doesn’t drag on the floor. I have plenty of room left over inside. Great robe, soft, absorbs well, looks classy. It’s like the robe you would get to use at a day spa or fancy hotel. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because I feel it’s over priced. I would’ve been more satisfied paying $75 not $115.

This I would put in the category of plush!  It reminds ne of the robes at the Bellagio hotel in Vegas.  It's soft cozy when dry.  And absorbent when getting outta the shower.  Im glad I bought one my husband is jealous.  Guess I'll be getting him one for Christmas :)

We ordered two of these for use around the house and when we get out of the hot tub. They are nice, but the inside is cheap and thin. We decided to keep them because ordering robes blind is hit and miss and we didn’t want to keep sending everything back. We settled.  Overall they are ok. For the light use they get, they aren’t bad. They are pretty warm in winter because they don’t breathe and aren’t natural fibers.  The colors are misleading. We ordered sandstone and aqua thinking they would be grey and blue. The robes are brown and a greenish grey respectively.  I would not order these again.

This was exactly what I was looking for. The lining is terry cloth and the exterior is a smooth cotton. It's not super absorbent, so I would not recommend using it to towel off. I ordered a size larger, because I wanted it to be super oversized. If I were to order at my actual size, it would fit fine. Would definitely recommend.

I am 5’ tall and weigh 115, but the “small” was huge on me and should have been labeled a large. I tried to get it altered was told it would cost twice as much to take it up as its purchase price. 评论概述: I really wanted this to work

I really wanted this to work.  The first month was great, now it's going down hill.
Very comfortable and cozy.  Exactly what I was looking for.
Great I love it
Love this robe. Super soft and comfortable for after the pool or hot tub.

I had a spa robe from a different company.  I was going to buy it from the same company for the same price but the shipping was $25.00 and this one free shipping.  I thought this robe looked exactly the same as the last one I had from the other company, and wanted to save on shipping and use my points, etc.  This robe is made cheaply, the terry very rough, and it doesn't close below mid thighs. Live and learn, hind sight is 20/20, blah blah.  I am disappointed in myself.  The other robe lasted 15 years, very high quality.  I really thought this one would be the same, but I was wrong.  I bet it won't last long.  Wish the other company sold their robe on Amazon.

评论概述: Great bath robe, fit is a bit bigger than expected.

I like this robe but I don't love it.  The inside Terry cloth is kind of blah.  The outside is perfect.  And it fits sort of weird in the front. I ordered this for my husband as a father's day gift.  I used the sellers size chart, and ordered an XL. It was HUGE!  Liked the look and feel of the robe, and it seemed to be good quality, but I had to send it back. I was soooo disappointed.

Many years ago I received a Restoration Hardware Spa robe as a gift.  I loved it, but unfortunately, it was starting to deteriorate.  I bought this robe to replace it.  The quality is just as good as my old robe, the sizing is exactly as I'd expect, and delivery was fast.  The interior terry lining is soft and absorbent.  The outer microfiber shell allows for a nice drape.  Highly recommended!
This robe smells like natural gas and after 4 sanitize cycle washes it still smells that way.  It actually makes other clothes smell the same.

Got it for my husband and son for Christmas. They absolutely love it!  Fit perfectly, very comfortable! My husband wear it at home on the weekends sometimes all day, he just love it!

I'm 5'8 and wear an 18/20 US.  The XXL is too large, but I'm keeping it.  The fabric is luxurious and the weight is a medium-weight, not too light and not too heavy.  I use it at the spa and it's great.  My only complaint is that there is about 6" of gap at the bottom although tied, even while standing.  It doesn't close completely like it does in the images of the man.  Look at the images of the woman leaning against the chair and sitting in the chair - it gaps like this.  I have to be sure I keep it pulled tight when sitting down.

评论概述: Legendary robe for my ailing father's sensitive skin
评论详情: This robe is the heavy, luxurious and soft. It wicks sweat rapidly and feels extremely soft against your skin.  My father has a rare autoimmune condition that makes his skin extremely sensitive to the touch. This robe has been a god-sent for him and I'm so glad that I was able to find it.  If you're looking for a robe of legendary quality...be it for medical or completely vain reasons...this is the robe you're looking for.
